trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para componentes que fornecem suporte de tempo de design em um host de designer para controles de servidor Web derivados da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um host designer, quando o usuário alterna da origem para o modo de Design, o código de origem de marcação que descreve um controle derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe abstrata é analisada e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistido no código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe abstrata serve como uma classe base para componentes que fornecem suporte de tempo de design para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> em um host do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> propriedades de classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contém um objeto que é derivado do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> classe para cada nível na árvore de herança do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades fornecem acesso às propriedades correspondentes do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> propriedade fornece acesso para o designer da fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> propriedade obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> métodos da classe fornecerem a seguinte funcionalidade:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> método invoca um editor de componente para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método é usado para adicionar, remover ou propriedades de tempo de design do controle associado de sombra.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> método gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner de controle, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> método obtém a fonte de dados do recipiente de modelo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método é chamado quando há uma alteração para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método é chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método é chamado quando as alterações de esquema da fonte de dados de controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método é chamado quando um esquema de formatação automática tiver sido aplicado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> métodos podem ser substituídos para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando um estilo de controle associado foi alterado ou quando os verbos do designer de edição do modelo foram alterados, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> método manipula o evento do criador de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> classe quando ele cria o controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção da lista de ação de designer para esse designer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propriedade cria vazio <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> e o adiciona a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> que é retornado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base propriedade a este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele adiciona o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> de objeto e, em seguida, retorna essa <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de chave de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField" /> valor do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A> propriedade fornece acesso de designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> propriedade do controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indica a chave primária da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do campo de membro de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> valor do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedade fornece acesso de designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> propriedade do controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indica a tabela ou um elemento da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor da propriedade da fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> valor do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> propriedade fornece acesso de designer para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> propriedade do controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o designer da fonte de dados, quando um é selecionado para associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O designer da fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> propriedade retorna o designer da fonte de dados do controle associado que deriva de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto designer implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a versão da propriedade da ID da fonte de dados do designer e é usada para sombrear a propriedade correspondente do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que é a ID da fonte de dados do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: Configuração do designer <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propriedade faz com que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade do controle associado a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> é definido como um <xref:System.String>, indicando uma nova fonte de dados deve ser definido, um **criar fonte de dados** caixa de diálogo é exibida.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> é definido como um <xref:System.String> indicando que não há nenhuma fonte de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> é definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exibição padrão da fonte de dados associada ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> que representa o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> propriedade obtém o modo de exibição padrão da fonte de dados que está associado ao controle associado, passando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedade para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum modo de exibição é retornado ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedade não for definida, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> é usado para obter o modo de exibição nomes e o primeiro nome de exibição é usado para obter o modo de exibição padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo designer e libera opcionalmente os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Se um controle associado que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe tem um <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> propriedade que implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> método desconecta o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> eventos do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> método, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> desconecta o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> também desconecta o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> eventos o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, ele chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> método de base.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que a fonte de dados deve conter.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <see langword="false" /> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a fonte de dados retornada contiver dados fictícios; <see langword="false" /> se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados de uma fonte de dados real.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que funciona como uma fonte de dados para uso em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objeto da fonte de dados definida pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não for possível, ele cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> de dados fictícios.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> usado como um modelo para o formato de dados.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: O número mínimo de linhas de dados de exemplo que os dados de origem de dados devem conter.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <see langword="false" /> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a fonte de dados retornada contiver dados fictícios; <see langword="false" /> se a fonte de dados retornados contiver dados de uma fonte de dados real.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Gera um objeto que pode ser usado como uma fonte de dados em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que funciona como uma fonte de dados para uso em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método tenta construir um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objeto da fonte de dados que é especificado pelo `selectedDataSource` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Se isso não for possível, ele cria um <xref:System.Data.DataTable> de dados fictícios.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente da fonte de dados do contêiner do controle associado, resolvido para um membro de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> of the associated control, resolved to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contém o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> de tempo de design do controle associado, resolvido para o parâmetro <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se uma fonte de dados não for encontrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método para construir uma fonte de dados do objeto especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> derivam de propriedades do controle associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o componente da fonte de dados do contêiner de controles associados.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> property of the associated control; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contém a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> de tempo de design do controle associado; caso contrário, <see langword="null" /> se uma fonte de dados não for encontrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para construir uma fonte de dados do objeto especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> derivado de propriedade do controle associado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que especifica o nome do modelo para o qual obter a fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte de dados do contêiner do modelo.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing a design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contém uma propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método para construir uma fonte de dados do objeto especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> derivam de propriedades do controle associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource(System.String)" /> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource(System.String)" /> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Callers should use the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Os chamadores devem usar o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource" /> método em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="templateName" /> parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: O <paramref name="templateName" /> parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Um controle derivado do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />, que implementa um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e projetar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> método quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> método e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conecte-se para eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> conecta-se à fonte de dados de tempo de design e atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> propriedade implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> se conecta a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o controle derivado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, que é associado a este designer ou uma cópia desse controle.

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O índice da página com a qual inicializar o editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Invoca um editor de componentes para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> método cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> do objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método do editor do componente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que acionou o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see langword="AutoFormat" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Manipula o evento <see langword="AutoFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormat%2A> method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormat%2A> método está obsoleto e não tem nenhuma funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> que define um estilo.

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando um esquema de formatação automática foi aplicado ao controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método é chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objeto é aplicado para o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objeto define uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> objeto que é aplicado ao controle.

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: Um designer pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> para inspecionar propriedades do controle ou executar alguma outra ação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando há uma alteração no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método é chamado quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> eventos de um controle que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe executa.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade do controle (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grade).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> objeto ao qual o controle está associado é alterado, o controle é redesenhado na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados do controle associado tiver sido alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta-se o controle associado que deriva o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe à fonte de dados atual, e se for diferente da fonte de dados ao qual o controle foi conectado, o método atualiza a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o evento do criador de propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> método invoca um editor de componente para o controle associado que é derivado de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe.

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> do objeto e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método do editor do componente.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o esquema da fonte de dados do controle associado é alterado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que o designer estiver no modo de edição de modelo ou um campo está sendo adicionado ou editado, a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> chamadas de método de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método, que por sua vez chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> para atualizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> controle para refletir a alteração da fonte de dados.

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando um estilo do controle associado foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> método pode servir como a notificação de que um estilo de associado controle que é derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser substituído para implementar a funcionalidade que deve ocorrer quando os verbos de edição de modelo do designer foram alterados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> método pode ser implementado para executar o processamento adicional, como gravação que ocorreu uma alteração, quando altera os verbos de edição de modelo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged" /> method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged" /> método é abstrato e deve ser substituído quando uma classe derivada herda o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que implementa uma interface <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover propriedades da exibição ou adicionar outras propriedades a ela na grade **Propriedades** ou para sombrear propriedades do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos que são derivados do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para controles que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> classe, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> cria propriedades de tempo de design para sombra a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Substituir o <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para adicionar ou alterar atributos de propriedades na coleção de propriedades de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de chamar o método base antes de executar outro processamento.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o esquema pode ser atualizado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <see langword="false" /> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para desabilitar eventos de associação de dados até depois que o esquema tiver sido atualizado; <see langword="false" /> para habilitar os eventos.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma descrição desse membro, consulte <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.
